title: Schema for Zielobjekte Extraction
description: Validates the list of Zielobjekte extracted from the Strukturanalyse document (A.1).

zielobjekte.description: A list of all target objects (Zielobjekte).

kuerzel.description: The unique, customer-defined ID of the Zielobjekt, e.g., 'A-001'.

name.description: The full, descriptive name of the Zielobjekt, e.g., 'Main Web Server'.
